column1: Table Title: Civil Aircraft Arrivals And Departures, Passengers And Mail - Changi Airport, Annual
Source: CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY OF SINGAPORE

column3: Total Aircraft Arrivals And Departures -> Aircraft Arrivals (Number)
column4: Total Aircraft Arrivals And Departures -> Aircraft Departures (Number)

column1: Data from January 1989 refers to Changi Airport only.  Data covers all aircraft services.
Total Aircraft Arrivals And Departures -> Aircraft Arrivals (Number):
Refers to commercial passenger and cargo aircraft arrivals.
Total Aircraft Arrivals And Departures -> Aircraft Departures (Number):
Refers to commercial passenger and cargo aircraft departures.
Refer to arriving, departing and in transit passengers.

Refers to passengers who arrived and departed on the same aircraft with the same flight number within 24 hours of scheduled time of arrival, to a country other than the country from which they embarked.
Mail tonnage consist of parcels and letters as declared by airlines.
Mail tonnage consist of parcels and letters as declared by airlines.
Mail tonnage consist of parcels and letters as declared by airlines.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified)
